text: The New Siberian Islands (Novosibirskiye Ostrova) are an archipelago on the northern Arctic. They are to the extreme North of Russia. They are North of the East Siberian coast between the Laptev Sea and the East Siberian Sea, north of the Sakha (Yakutia) Republic. Category:Sakha Republic Category:Islands of Russia Category:Archipelagos
title: New Siberian Islands
